get.description: This endpoint is used to check for the health of the application

503.description: The Health Check is not successful

post.description: This endpoint will help you create an integrator

message.example: The record has been successfully created.

get.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve an integrator details

message.example: The record has been successfully retrieved.

post.description: Login to your integrator account. This endpoint allows you to login to your account

message.example: login magic link sent to your email

get.description: Verify auth magic link and generate JWT access token. This endpoint allows you to verify your magic link and generate JWT access token
Provide your session Id to retieve all information about the logged user
Provide your session Id to logout the logged user
This endpoint is used to get a refresh token of the logged in user
This endpoint is used to retrieve the hash of the API KEY of the user

post.description: This endpoint is used to generate an the API Key which can be used to authorize transactions and more
This endpoint will create a fiat wallet for the integrator.

currency.example: eg NGN or GHS or KES

message.example: Fiat wallet has been successfully created.

currency.example: eg NGN or GHS or KES

deposit_balance.description: Amount of the wallet that has been deposited so far

get.description: This endpoint will return all the fiat wallets created by the integrator.

currency.example: eg NGN or GHS or KES

deposit_balance.description: Amount of the wallet that has been deposited so far

post.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to create the customers who will be transacting using the bank (Receiving and sending).

get.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to get all the customers who will be either receiving or sending money using bank.

patch.summary: Update a bank customer bio data
patch.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to update the bio data of a customer by passing customer key.

message.example: Bio Data has been successfully updated.

patch.summary: Update a bank customer contact data
patch.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to update the contact data of a customer by passing customer key.

line.example: 9, Fedrick Avenue, University View Estate, Olokonla, Ajah

patch.summary: Update a bank customer kyc data
patch.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to update the kyc data of a customer by passing customer key.

url.description: this could be ID photo url or BVN verification image url

get.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to get the customer who will be either receiving or sending money using bank by passing customer key.

post.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to create the customers who will be either receiving or sending money using mobile money.

get.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to get all the customers who will be either receiving or sending money using mobile money.

patch.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to update the customers who will be either receiving or sending money using mobile money.

get.summary: Get a mobile money customer by customer key
get.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to get the customer who will be either receiving or sending money using mobile money by passing customer key.

get.summary: Get a mobile money customer by Phone
get.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to get the customer who will be either receiving or sending money using mobile money by passing phone number.

post.description: This api will withdraw fiat from the integrators fiat wallet to the customers mobile money wallet.
This api will withdraw fiat from the integrators fiat wallet to the customers bank account.

get.description: This endpoint will return the status of the withdrawal request.

post.description: An integrators customers can initiate a deposit from their respective mobile money wallets.     An STK push will be sent to the customer and the respective amount will be deducted from their mobile money wallets and deposited into the integrators fiat wallet

get.summary: Get Deposit on Mobile Money status
get.description: An integrator can use this endpoint to check the status of a deposit
An integrator can use this endpoint to get the exchange rate between two currencies

post.description: This endpoint will create a request for off ramp and returns escrow address from which the integrator will send funds to.The request id generated will be used in /onchain/mobile-money api

post.summary: Send customer fiat from your crypto wallet
post.description: This endpoint will withdraw from crypto transaction details you provided  into customer mobile money wallet

request_id.description: request id obtained from Generate Offramp Request api

get.description: This endpoint will return the status of the withdrawal request.
This endpoint will return all the chains and coins that are supported by off ramp

post.description: Crypto deposits are where a customers mobile money wallet account is deducted a specific fiat amount which is then converted to a specified stablecoin amount and sent to the integrators crypto wallet. From there, the money/ stablecoin is transferred to the customers public address that matches the chain. This can also be called on-ramp

get.description: This endpoint will be used to get the status of the deposit onchain request
This endpoint will be used to get the supported chains for deposit onchain

message.example: Onramp onchain supported chains retrieved successfully.

post.summary: Send from Fiat Wallet to Crypto Wallet
post.description: This api give you the opportunity to withdraw from your kotanipay fiat wallet to a crypto address
